resources.string: Delete contacts on USIM card complete.
Import contacts from USIM card complete.
To import contacts via USIM card, turn off Airplane mode.
Your USIM card capacity is full, can not import new contacts. Please clear the USIM card and try again.
The USIM contact is already existing.
Error occurs when searching USIM card contacts
Loading USIM contacts, please wait for a mement…
Reading USIM card information (may take a minute)…
Position %1$d on USIM card is not valid, should between %2$d and %3$d
Your USIM card can store %d contacts, Are you sure you want to proceed?

"\"You don't have any contacts to display.
To add contacts, press "Menu" and touch:
"
Accounts" to add or configure an account with contacts you can sync to the device "" "
New contact" to create a new contact from scratch "" "
Import/Export" to import contacts from your USIM or Device ""\" "

"\"You don't have any contacts to display. (If you just added an account, it can take a few minutes to sync contacts.)
To add contacts, press "Menu" and touch:
"
Accounts" to add or configure an account with contacts you can sync to the phone "" "
Display options" to change which contacts are visible "" "
New contact" to create a new contact from scratch "" "
Import/Export" to import contacts from your USIM or Device ""\" "
